Text: Thanks.  Was wondering what "Since it's not allowed to add Expanded Edition, we've left it out" meant

Maybe it was added to TPB's "do not post" list after a copyright complaint, but who cares? Disc 4 of this release is the same bonus material as disc 2 of the prior "deluxe" edition, and is available in FLAC form here: https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7057424
